info.title: eKYC
info.description: eKYC APIs can be used by any external system to communicate with the eKYC platform, primarily for KYC Upload and Query KYC information. eKYC system also provides the APIs for National ID and Dealer Check

get.description: Query Dealer API is invoked with the Dealer MSISDN, and eKYC System checks internally whether Any Dealer Exists in system with given MSISDN. If Dealer exists the eKYC system returns the Dealer Information.

parameters.name: msisdn
parameters.description: Dealer MSISDN

parameters.name: refId
parameters.description: Application Reference Id, if Any

put.description: Dealer Change-PIN API - This API is used to Change PIN for Dealer

parameters.name: msisdn
parameters.description: Dealer MSISDN

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Old PIN and New PIN should be provided in the request content along with the Application Reference Id

post.description: This API can be used to Check the given NID for total number of KYCs registered against given NID, In response to this API call eKYC system returns whether NID is registered with eKYC system or not. API returns the number of SIMs registered against the NID, if NID is registered.

parameters.name: dealer
parameters.description: MSISDN of Dealer who is initiating the request

parameters.name: pin
parameters.description: Dealer PIN

post.description: This API can be used to Check the total number of KYCs registered against given ID, In response to this API call eKYC system returns whether ID is registered with eKYC system or not. API returns the number of SIMs registered against the ID, if ID is registered.

parameters.name: dealer
parameters.description: MSISDN of Dealer who is initiating the request

parameters.name: pin
parameters.description: Dealer PIN

get.description: This API can be used to query the KYCs registered against given ID, In response to this API call eKYC system checks whether ID is registered with eKYC system or not, and returns the KYC details registered with the ID, if ID is registered.

parameters.name: dealer
parameters.description: MSISDN of Dealer who is initiating the request

parameters.name: pin
parameters.description: Dealer PIN

get.description: This API can be used to query the KYC status based on ServiceNumber, SIM No, IMSI or Transaction Id

parameters.name: searchType
parameters.description: KYC Status Query InfoType to be searched

parameters.name: searchNumber
parameters.description: Interpretation of SearchNumbr depends on the "searchType" Field

parameters.name: dealer
parameters.description: MSISDN of Dealer who is initiating the request

get.description: This API can be used to Retrieve the KYC Info based on ServiceNumber, SIM No, IMSI

parameters.name: searchType
parameters.description: KYC Query InfoType to be searched

parameters.name: searchNumber
parameters.description: Interpretation of SearchNumbr depends on the "searchType" Field

parameters.name: dealer
parameters.description: MSISDN of Dealer who is initiating the request

post.description: This API can be used to create the KYC Record on eKYC system and to upload the required KYC Documents.

parameters.name: searchType
parameters.description: KYC Query InfoType to be searched

parameters.name: searchNumber
parameters.description: Interpretation of SearchNumbr depends on the "searchType" Field

parameters.name: dealer
parameters.description: MSISDN of Dealer who is initiating the request

parameters.name: pin
parameters.description: Dealer PIN

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: KYC Record to be created on eKYC system

put.description: This API can be used to update the KYC Record on eKYC system (Re-KYC)

parameters.name: searchType
parameters.description: KYC Query InfoType to be searched

parameters.name: searchNumber
parameters.description: Interpretation of SearchNumbr depends on the "searchType" Field

parameters.name: dealer
parameters.description: MSISDN of Dealer who is initiating the request

parameters.name: pin
parameters.description: Dealer PIN

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Re-KYC or KYC Update Information

get.description: This API can be used to retrieve the Dealer Transaction History from eKYC System

parameters.name: records
parameters.description: Maximum Number of Transaction Records to be retrieved in response

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Dealer Transactions to be retrieved from given date

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Dealer Transactions to be retrieved upto given date

parameters.name: txnType
parameters.description: Comma separated list of Transaction Types to be retrieved: NID_QUERY, KYC_STATUS, KYC_QUERY, KYC_CREATE, KYC_UPDATE, CHANGE_PIN

get.description: Get MSISDN Status API to check the MSISDN status from eKYC system. Generally this API would be used to check the MSISDN is valid or not, before proceeding with the SIM Sale, KYC submission.

parameters.name: refId
parameters.description: Application Reference Id, if Any

code.description: The unique response code that indicates the response status of the request. See the Response codes for more detailed information

message.description: Response description of the response code

DealerInfo.title: DealerInfo
DealerInfo.description: eKYC Dealer's Information. The information includes Dealer MSISDN, Name, email, Creation & Expiry Date along with Status

GenericResponse.title: GenericResponse
GenericResponse.description: Generic Response Object to communicate only result without any additional operation related data/information

NIDInfo.title: NIDInfo
NIDInfo.description: KYC counts associated with National ID

registeredKYC.description: Total Registered KYC(s) with given NID

activeKYC.description: Total Active KYC(s) with given NID

allowedKYC.description: Remaining Allowed KYC(s) for given NID

IDInfo.title: IDInfo
IDInfo.description: KYC counts associated with requested ID

registeredKYC.description: Total Registered KYC(s) with given ID

activeKYC.description: Total Active KYC(s) with given ID

allowedKYC.description: Remaining Allowed KYC(s) for given ID

serviceNumber.description: Service Number for which KYC Status was enquired

kycStatus.description: Current Status of the KYC approval

simStatus.description: Current status of the SIM Activation

info.description: Info field will have the information about why the Re-KYC is required

serviceNumber.description: Service Number for which Status was enquired

title.description: Title or Salutation to be prefixed to person's name

subscriberName.description:
In case it is different from the Documents. 
Name of Minor Subscriber, in case SIM is issue by using other person’s documents

dob.description: Date of Birth of Person/Subscriber or Date of incorporation for business

changeDate.description: Date of Last Update of KYC Record

kycStatus.description: Current Status of the KYC approval

simStatus.description: Current status of the SIM Activation

data1.description: BASE64 Encoded Binary Data (Max Size = 2 MB) - Front-Side scan of Document

data2.description: BASE64 Encoded Binary Data (Max Size = 2 MB) - Back-Side scan of Document

title.description: Title or Salutation to be prefixed to person's name

subscriberName.description:
In case it is different from the Documents. 
Name of Minor Subscriber, in case SIM is issue by using other person’s documents

dob.description: Date of Birth of Person/Subscriber or Date of incorporation for business

reKyc.description: This field determines where the KYC Record is for Re-KYC or new KYC Record

param1.description: Transaction Details: Should be intrepreted based on Transaction Type

param2.description: Transaction Details: Should be intrepreted based on Transaction Type

param3.description: Transaction Details: Should be intrepreted based on Transaction Type

param4.description: Transaction Details: Should be intrepreted based on Transaction Type

param5.description: Transaction Details: Should be intrepreted based on Transaction Type

id.description: ID to be checked or queried

consentMsg.description: Message to be sent to Subscriber seeking consent for revealing KYC details

id.description: ID to be checked or queried

consentMsg.description: Message to be sent to Subscriber seeking consent for revealing KYC details

Consent.title: Consent
Consent.description: Whether Subscriber Consent is required, default 'N"

CustomerType.title: CustomerType
CustomerType.description: Customer Type (Individual, Minor, Corporate, Non-Citizen etc.)

DataType.title: DataType
DataType.description: KYC Document Data Format (PDF, JPG or PNG)

KycMode1.title: KycMode1
KycMode1.description: KYC Mode: Mode by which KYC Request is initiated

Status.title: Status
Status.description: Whether given NID is found in eKYC Subscriber database or not

Status1.title: Status1
Status1.description: Whether given ID is found in eKYC Subscriber database or not

Type1.title: Type1
Type1.description: Type of Transaction: NID_QUERY, KYC_STATUS, KYC_QUERY, KYC_CREATE, KYC_UPDATE, CHANGE_PIN

Type2.title: Type2
Type2.description: Identity Type to be checked or queried
